data.name: RainDesktop
data.detailed_description:
RainDesktop allows you to display customizable themes on your desktop with build-in WYSIWYG visual designer, from system and weather information to audio visualizers. You are only limited by your imagination and creativity.

FEATURES

  • Build-in WYSIWYG visual designer makes it easy to create themes for your desktop.
  • Build-in Steam Workshop makes it easy to download and share desktop themes with just One-Click.
  • Clean UI, Easy to use and minimum CPU and RAM usage.
  • Desktop theme animation will pause while playing games or running full screen application.
  • Support Multi-Monitors
  • Bring life to your desktop with realtime graphics, videos, applications or websites.
  • Personalize your desktop or create your own desktop theme using the built-in Visual Designer.
  • Support for all aspect ratios and native resolutions including 16:9, 21:9, 16:10, 4:3 etc.
